column2: New Heavy Machine Design: The ALFA 44 Heavy Machine Gun

The ALFA Modelo 44 machine gun was an indigenously designed Spanish machine gun appearing during World War 2.  The weapon was produced by the Fabrica de Armas de Oviedo and survived the war to see service well into the Cold War years.
